title: FS - 11 T206 in various conditions - sold
author: tsp06

posts.post_title: FS - 11 T206 in various conditions - sold
posts.post_content:
I have 11 T206 I would like to move as they are duplicates at this point.  I'm looking for reasonable offers on any or all but would prefer to sell as a lot.  

I will plan to send up to two cards via pwe.  Three or more will ship via first class bubble mailer.  If the entire lot sells as one I will ship in a flat rate small priority box.  Shipping will be included in any agreed upon price.  The cards are viewable via the link below.   Please let me know if you have any questions. 

[url]http://imgur.com/a/SZGewrg[/url]

Payment by PayPal f&f preferred.  Thanks.

Tommy
These might work for a project I’m working on.
Deliciously low grade…
Do you have a lot price?

Hi familytoad.

Thanks for your message. I received an offer for the entire lot.  I have accepted it and awaiting payment. I'll let you know if it falls through. 

Thanks,

Tommy

No worries!
Glad they found a new home!
